about_the_game:
The City Is Gone. Can You Survive?


Yuri "Danila" Dimiriev ( Юрий "Данила" Димириев ) is a soldier who is on training by C.A.P.I.T.A.L. which is an international military corporation. During the outbreak, C.A.P.I.T.A.L. H.Q. members were unaware of what happened. But almost everyone else were infected in the city. Can Danila get out of the capital of Turkey alive and uninfected?

Your choices will change your in-game future. You should make the right choices to survive. In the apocalypse, mistakes bring blood.

Capital is an Action FPS Game which is built on a deep linear story. In addition to reflecting post-apocalyptic action, you will also be able to experience the action during the apocalypse. Explore the environment, trade and communicate with people. Improve your gear. And most importantly, survive.

content_descriptors.notes:
Realistic Violence
Realistic Bloodshed
Tobacco and Alcohol Reference
Strong Language

name: CAPITAL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8600k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
